snippet.title: Rogue Voltage - Steam Next Fest Demo Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
** Update: Rogue Voltage will be part of Steam Next Fest June 2023 **

Rogue Voltage is a hybrid between Roguelike Deckbuilder, automation game, turn-based tactics JRPG and a modular synthesizer.

Construct your own skills by wiring up modules. Generate and manage energy, manipulate the timeline, beat procedural threats and try to get the power back on in a world in which time is out of joint.

Play the FREE DEMO on Steam: https://s.team/a/1494560

Come chat: https://discord.gg/bGpnfJFUPj
Twitter: https://twitter.com/_RogueVoltage

#roguelike #rpg #modularsynth #indiegame #gaming #trailer #steam #jrpg
